titleStmt.title: His Highness Prince Rupert's letter to the Earl of Arlington, His Majesties principal secretary of state from on board the Soveraign now under sail, June 5, about seven leagues off Lastoff, at nine in the morning, the wind at e.n.e.
titleStmt.author: Rupert, Prince, Count Palatine, 1619-1682.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
